Title: Relates to mandating the installation of ignition interlock devices
Summary: Mandates the installation of ignition interlock devices by 2022 for motor vehicles manufactured for use in this state; mandates all motor vehicles in NYS shall be equipped with such devices by 2023.
LawCode: Add ยง1198-b, V & T L
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the vehicle and traffic law, in relation to mandating ignition interlock devices
